content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I never seen this concept in coding game. It is well explained and all tests pass.

❌ Rejected the contribution.
Comment: After reflection there is a problem of conversion for non user of python.We loss time for that.I suggest to replace the string inputs by integer . Sorry to be the 1st person to reject this contribution.

Après reflexion , il y a un problème de conversion pour les non utilisateurs de python . Nous perdons du temps pour ça . Je suggère de remplacer les entree  string par des entiers . Désolé d'être la 1ere personne a rejeter cette contribution

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's a good coc

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Its funny simple and smooth

I began with Java but CodinGame gave me the possibilities to try some other language . Also for find work in video game , I changed  language and use C# because I need to Use Unity who compile C# scripts.

The problem is you put a string in a input.
 So in C# 
I have to use int result = Int32.Parse(STRINGTOCONVERT); who convert a string to int. 
Plus I have to use row.substring(j,1) for read a number and that it's the case that all number is only 1 digit. I have also to control how many digit compose a number. And put them in an array( don' t know if it's the good word for tableau in french). That to much  when you have only 15 minutes .

The problem is here , you have to change a type of an  input in the stub generator to make it easyer . And I don't think players know all by heart the command of input of their languages.

Ah! It's about

read W:int
read H:int
loop H read row:string(1024)

Hm, I will see how to change it to read H lines with W integers.
